article.headline: Kelloggâs Incogmeato partners with Disney for Mickey Mouse plant-based nuggets
article.body: Incogmeato and Disney have teamed up for plant-based nuggets that will appeal to kids Incogmeato Incogmeato, the plant-based food brand from Kellogg Co. K, +0.96%, said Thursday that it has partnered with Walt Disney Co. DIS, +1.53% for Mickey Mouse-shaped plant-based Chickân Nuggets. The item will be available at retailers this month. Nearly half of families with children (44%) are eating plant-based proteins, according to data provided by Incogmeato. And another 36% are likely to consume them in the next year or two. Kellogg stock is down 7.6% for the year to date. Disney shares have fallen 8.7%. And the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% is down 1.8% for the period.
